document.full_text: in 1956, burlyce sherrell logan was one of the first black students at the university of north texas. she dropped out amid the turmoil of the civil rights era on campus, but returned decades later.
document.title: a college degree, 55 years and an era in the making
lines_and_colors: in 1956, burlyce sherrell logan was one of the first black students at the university of north texas. she dropped out amid the turmoil of the civil rights era on campus, but returned decades later.
